attributes.action: Stop the commercial fishing for pike on Lough Erne
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the commercial fishing for pike on Lough Erne

STOP DCAL (N.IRELAND) ISSUING COMMERCIAL LICENCES netting pike for human consumption with total disregard for the welfare of the pike in lough erne and the long term effects on the lough. Alone allowing netting to continue would have a devastating effect on DCAL and any revenue to the economy  that visiting anglers bring to N.Ireland.
